column1: #Text=Responsibilities: You will abstract away complex data interactions with easy-to-use APIs that will power several mobile and web applications.
#Text=You will also own, scale, and maintain the computational and storage infrastructure for the various micro-services and long-running jobs, designed and implemented by you and the team.
#Text=We will look to you to make key decisions on the technology stack... architecture, networking, and security.
#Text=We love working with bleeding-edge technology, especially if it improves the malleability, and simplicity of our deliverables.
#Text=Coordinating with development department to determine application requirement.Key Skills: Python.

#Text=JavaScript Java PHP Responsibilities: You will abstract away complex data interactions with easy-to-use APIs that will power several mobile and web applications You will also own, scale, and maintain the computational and storage infrastructure for the various micro-services and long-running jobs, designed and implemented by you and the team Coordinating with development department to determine application requirement
